Waco.Waco metropolitan area: The Waco Metropolitan Statistical Area, as defined by the United States Census Bureau, is an area consisting of McLennan and Falls counties in Central Texas, anchored by the city of Waco. As of the 1 April 2010 census (which included only McLennan County), the MSA had a population of 234,906. The 2016 population estimate is 265,207 which includes Falls County (added to the Waco MSA in 2013).
